title: American Pie Revealed
description:
========== PROTOCOL22 PRESENTS ==============


  ------- AMERICAN PIE REVEALED ----------



Directors:        Dave McVeigh
                  Scott McVeigh


Writers:          Dave McVeigh (writer)
                  Scott McVeigh (writer)


Release Date:     2003 (USA) 

Genre:            Documentary / Comedy 


DVD Rip -- 3 Hours 15 Mins.

Format oog    


Fans of American Pie will love this documentary 
as it charts the making of all three pie movies 
with all unseen footage - But what just makes 
this DVD "must have" is the missing story lines 
from Pie 2 including deleted scenes of Sean 
Penn as Stifflers dad and Oz and Heather's break up.
This DVD is everything a pie fan want's and more.I
was expecting a lot but I got more.
The Pie three segment was good as well with the 
beginning to end of the making off present and also 
the reunion dinner where all the lads from Pie 1 to 
3 and cast and crew reunite to speak about their best 
times and scenes while making the trilogy.This is 
a must see documentary.

N.B. >< ***
